mapper.insert: insert into item_image (item_id, file_name, file_path, ordering_number, create_datetime, rep_image_check) values (#{itemId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{orderingNumber}, #{createDatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repImageCheck})
mapper.select: select item_image_id, file_name from item_image where item_id = #{itemId}
select * from item_image order by item_image_id desc
